sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios" import react, {useState, useEffect} from "react" const CountryInfo = ({country})=>{ const [weather, setWeather] = useState([]); const key = '0bcf1cc82c6ef26d96f0b36d146c06db' const url = `http://api.weatherstack.com/current?access_key=${key}&query=${country.capital}` useEffect(() => { axios.get(url) .then(response => { console.log('promise fullfilled') setWeather(response.data) }) }, [country]) return (

{country.name}

capital: {country.capital}

population: {country.population}

languages:
    {country.languages.map((language)=>{return
  • {language.name}
    • })}
{weather &&

Weather in {country.capital}

temperature:

{weather.current.temperature} Celcius

wind:

{weather.current.wind_speed} mph direction {weather.current.wind_dir}

}
) } export default CountryInfo;
